properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel; Chesapeake Bay from Smith Point to Windmill Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from Windmill Point to New Point Comfort VA; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA; James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 2 at 9:37PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
Check of surface and buoy observations shows southwesterly winds
generally 10 to 15 knots with a few gusts to 20 knots over the
Chesapeake Bay, especially at elevated sensors. This period of
marginally enhanced winds is expected to be short-lived and winds
should diminish prior to midnight.

NWSheadline: WINDS APPROACHING SMALL CRAFT THRESHOLDS OVER PORTIONS OF THE BAY
